text:
@kylegriffin1 I don't believe her statement "We will not see diseases like the Coronavirus come here" aged well. 

We already had 5 cases, as of 1/28/2020 HHS briefing.
another stable genius? Please no! Our country doesn't deserve anymore of those!

#helpUS thru #COVID19

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
